name: Ion Projector DEM
customPrimary:
Fires an ion beam when close to the target, dealing negligible levels of energy damage and %s EMP DPS, over %s seconds. The beam's damage is affected by modifers that affect missile weapons rather than energy ones.
When the fired beam hits hull or armor, it continually generates arcs which strike weapons and engines, dealing additional energy and EMP damage. When the beam hits shields, an arc is randomly generated through the shields depending on the target's hard flux level.

name: Chaos Armament
customPrimary:
Each shot in a burst fires one of the following special munitions, each with a %s chance:
-Pulse: Significantly increased maneuverability and speed. Fires %s missiles, each dealing %s energy and %s EMP damage.
-Disruption: Unguided after a brief aiming period. Slows the target on hit and deals %s kinetic damage.
-Termination: Significantly reduced maneuverability and speed. Deals %s fragmentation damage over a %s SU area.
-Dissolver: A MIRV which splits into %s micro-missiles; each dealing %s high explosive damage while also dealing damage to armor equal to %s of their standard damage: %s.
